paper.title: Using Unsupervised Machine Learning for Online Monitoring of Turbine-Generator Bearings in Hydro-Electrical Generating Stations
paper.abstract: Electric utilities undertake a significant cost to maintain the health of their assets every year. In recent years, in BC Hydro, one of the strategies in maintaining generating stations has been to shift focus from preventative maintenance to predictive maintenance. This approach could help utilities to reduce their expensive preventative maintenance expenditure and further rely on predictive measures to assess the health risk of assets and only execute physical interventions when the assessed risk compels. In this paper, the authors share BC Hydro's experience in using machine learning for predictive online monitoring of turbine and generator bearings in hydro-electrical generating stations. In addition, the paper presents two successful examples where predictive monitoring prevented forced outages and saved the company financial loss and downtime.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论使用无监督机器学习进行水力发电站涡轮发电机轴承的在线监测和预测性维护，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
